# structural_starterkit
A Python package that installs all required packages for Structural Python core training for Python version >= 3.13.

```toml
dependencies = [
    "numpy",
    "pandas",
    "openpyxl",
    "lxml",
    "shapely>=2.0.0",
    "matplotlib",
    "plotly",
    "sectionproperties>=3.5.0",
    "concreteproperties>=0.6.4",
    "pycba>=0.5.2",
    "PyNiteFEA==1.1.2",
    "scipy",
    "handcalcs",
    "more-itertools",
    "forallpeople",
    "pytest",
    "rich",
    "tqdm",
    "papermodels",
    "xlwings",
    "IPython",
    "ipywidgets",
    "ipykernel",
    "jupyterlab",
    "jupyterlab-mathjax3",
    "nbconvert",
    "python-docx",
    "pynite-tools>=0.6.4",
    "sectionproperties-tools>=0.2.0",
    "millrun>=0.3.0",
    "jsonchain>=0.5.1",
    "papermill>=2.6.0",
    "great-tables>=0.17.0",
    "xl-engine>=0.4.0",
    "nb-hideinputs>=0.2.0",
]
```
